text:
[Verse]
Morning sun lights up the sky
Coffee brews fresh and high
Wake me up don't let me sleep
Life in a cup warm and deep

[Verse 2]
Sip by sip I find my way
Fuel for the chase every day
From dawn till dusk I'll keep on
With my cup I'm never wrong

[Chorus]
Life in a cup keeps me going
Energy keeps flowing
Every drop makes me strong
Keeps me singing my song

[Verse]
Rainy days and foggy nights
Sips of warmth lights my fight
Cold can't hold me down no more
In my cup I find my core

[Verse 2]
Friends gather round the table
Talking life every fable
Sharing dreams one by one
Life in a cup till we're done

[Chorus]
Life in a cup keeps me going
Energy keeps flowing
Every drop makes me strong
Keeps me singing my song
title: Life in a Cup
